common.title: Video Tools

gifConfig.title: GIF Export Settings
gifConfig.clickToConvert: Click the button to start converting video to GIF
gifConfig.pleaseWait: Please do not close this window
gifConfig.conversionSuccess: 変換が成功しました！GIFがデバイスに保存されました
gifConfig.conversionError: 変換に失敗しました。もう一度お試しください
gifConfig.conversionCancelled: 変換がキャンセルされました

tips.lowResolution: Lower resolution and frame rate can reduce file size
tips.chooseAppropriate: Choose appropriate resolution for best results
tips.timeSettings: Set time range to convert only specific segments of the video

gifConfig.startTimeGreaterThanEndTime: Start time must be less than end time
gifConfig.endTimeGreaterThanDuration: End time must be less than video duration

videoToGif.title: Video to GIF
videoToGif.description: Convert video files to GIF animations

gifToVideo.title: GIF to Video
gifToVideo.description: Convert GIF animations to video files

videoTranscode.title: Video Transcode
videoTranscode.description: Convert video formats with multiple encoding options

videoCompress.title: Video Compress
videoCompress.description: Compress video file size while maintaining high quality

videoCrop.title: Video Crop
videoCrop.description: Crop video segments or adjust video dimensions

extractAudio.title: Extract Audio
extractAudio.description: Extract audio tracks from video files

metadata.title: Video Tools - Professional Online Video Processing Tools
metadata.description: Free online video processing tool collection. Supports video to GIF, GIF to video, video transcoding, video compression, video cropping, audio extraction and more.
